name: Friendly Fire (JojoPalambas)
description:
Story? Maybe, maybe not.

Just you, a fire and this strange place.

Who are you? We don't know. You don't know. You just happen to be here.

What is this fire? We don't know. You don't know. All you know is that it is your friend! Keep it alive, it is your only friend here...

What is this place? We don't know. You don't know. Things are weird here. Many things to burn. It seems like strange cults used to do their stuff here. Is that somehow linked to those strange mushrooms?

Gameplay

Keep the fire alive by feeding it all sorts of funny objects, with different effects! Try to burn all 17 object types, including the two legendary ones!
Expect cool visuals and fun challenges but watch out for.
Try collecting all kind of items to do the highest score !

Post your score in the comments, we are curious to see them.

Controls

Left-click: move or pickup

Right-click: drop or burn

Assets

Every asset of the game except for the skybox (which is not really visible anyways) were made by us during the Game Jam including : models, textures, animations and music/sounds.

Tools used
  • Unity
  • Blender for meshes and animations
  • Gimp for textures
  • Cubase / Audacity for musics and sounds
Note

We didn’t have time to polish certain aspects of the game :
the walk animation is a bit too chaotic Some textures could be prettier
The level design could use a little more variation

Hope you have a fun time ! :)
